title: Inheriting
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

description: Arika Waulu has inherited quite a lot in her young life. A young fighter for social justice, her inheritance is two-fold. She inherited her land from her ancestors and her sense of social justice from her parents. But rather than take these things for granted, Arika embraces them.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001977; Pitcha this : memories of Fitzroy : Foundation for Young Australians : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2010
